author: timbeiko
content:
On this week's ACD,  we'll be discussing potential paths forward for Holesky. PandaOps has a document outlining the various options: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/post-finality-path-forward-holesky

Staking pools, node operators, validators, if you have a strong opinion about the best option, please share it on the ACD agenda ahead of Thursday: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1346
